attributes.action: Remove Ian Duncan Smith from Office IMMEADIATELY
attributes.additional_details: Too many people have commited suicide through this mans ideology of disabled people...He needs to be removed as soon as possible...The fact that he thinks nothing of spending £39 on a breakfast AND THEN CLAIMING IT BACK...whilst people are having to use food banks as they cant afford to buy it...SOMETHING HAS GONE SERIOUSLY WRONG with the united kingdom.
attributes.background: THIS man has NO IDEA of the suffering that disable people try to live with. He has NO idea of ANY medical conditions, this he has shown IF he thinks that conditions such as Parkinsons and MS can be CURED.H e HAS NO idea of the daily struggle and the financial distress his 'ideas' have caused...

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. This includes petitions calling for Minsiters to be sacked.

If you would like the Government to change its policies, you could start a new petition calling for the change you want.
